I will take back my previous comment. This is actually the legit 11th episode! How awesome is this. NICE UP ETTV! Fucking stellar.

MKV that is totally unfriendly for media players because he/they haven't learned to tick a few boxes on the software. Also wont convert with MKV2VOB.

I appreciate the versions on WEB-DL because of that, the speed at which they are available, for those who commented earlier, this has no relation with the tv, because this episode is available on iTunes.
